title: Mutton saag
description: Mutton works well with big flavours and complements the iron-rich spinach in this tasty curry recipe.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz spinach leaves (preferably not baby spinach), stalks removed, washed and drained
900g/2lbs boneless mutton leg, cut into 4cm/1½in pieces (You may need to start off with a 1.7kg piece of mutton on the bone.)
1 tsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to taste
